WebLink.url: {!URLFOR('/apex/dsfs__DocuSign_CreateEnvelope', null, [SourceID = Account.Id, RC='',RSL='',RSRO='',RROS='',CCRM='',CCTM='',CRCL='',CRL="LoadDefaultContacts~1"+ ",Email~" + User.Email + ";FirstName~" + User.FirstName +";LastName~" + User.LastName+";RoutingOrder~4"+";Role~Signer 2",DST='',CCNM='',LA='0',LF='0',CEM='Dear ______COMMA_\\n\\nYou are receiving this email because you have agreed to enter into a Non-Disclosure Agreement (“NDA”) with Bynder. In order to finalise the NDA we request that you follow link below which will direct you to our e-signature portal.\\n\\nPlease complete the required information and sign the NDA. Once signed by both parties, you will receive a digital copy of the document.\\n\\nFor instructions on how to sign a document via DocuSign, please click here: https://support.docusign.com/en/articles/How-do-I-sign-a-DocuSign-document-Basic-Signing\\n\\nIf you are not the correct signatory please click here (https://support.docusign.com/en/guides/signer-guide-signing-change-signer) for further instructions on how to change signing responsibility.\\n\\nBest regards_COMMA_\\n\\n______________\\nBynder Legal Team',CES='[FirstName] [LastName] ([Email]) has sent you a DocuSign Signature request',SRS='',STB='',SSB='',SES='',SEM='',SRS='',SCS='',RES='' ])}
